history.narrative: Law 5-30, the “Foster Care Goals Act of 1983,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 5-199, which was referred to the Committee on Human Services. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on June 28, 1983, and July 12, 1983, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on July 21, 1983, it was assigned Act No. 5-52 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
